metadata.title: CVE-2018-18827 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There exists a heap-based buffer over-read in ff_vc1_pred_dc in vc1_block.c in Libav 12.3, which allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted aac file.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
vlc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
